articles.content: We're analysing all the major VAR decisions throughout all 64 games at the Women's World Cup. History was made between New Zealand and Norway on Thursday as a referee announced their VAR decision to … [+3826 chars]

articles.title: NZC not open to negotiating 2024 SA Test dates - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "We've collaborated and agreed dates with CSA, who have confirmed the tour, acknowledged the arrangements and have been in receipt of the schedule for several weeks," NZC says
